attributes.action: Pass legislation that will allow surgeons the organs and other body parts of a deceased person to become available for transplantation upon death.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many persons are dying,and suffering , needlessly whilst they await organs and other bodily parts for transplantation. I call upon the Government to legislate, to stop this unnecessary suffering. It should become mandatory, that upon death, that any part of your body that can be utilised to relieve suffering of others ( and not for experimental purposes), be permitted to be taken by surgeons for transplantation purposes.
